code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useNavigate,useSearchParams}from'react-router-dom';import{useAuth}from'../contexts/AuthContext';import AdminOverview from'./admin/AdminOverview';import StaffManagement from'./admin/StaffManagement';import ResourceManagement from'./admin/ResourceManagement';import AlertManagement from'./admin/AlertManagement';import AdminAnalytics from'./admin/AdminAnalytics';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function AdminDashboard(){const{user,logout}=useAuth();const navigate=useNavigate();const[searchParams]=useSearchParams();const[activeSection,setActiveSection]=useState('overview');useEffect(()=>{const section=searchParams.get('section');if(section&&['overview','staff','resources','alerts','analytics'].includes(section)){setActiveSection(section);}},[searchParams]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"admin-dashboard",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{className:"admin-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Admin Dashboard - Hospital Emergency Intelligence"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"admin-user-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["Admin: ",user.name]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>navigate('/dashboard'),className:"back-btn",children:"Back to Staff View"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:logout,className:"logout-btn",children:"Logout"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"admin-nav",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:activeSection==='overview'?'nav-btn active':'nav-btn',onClick:()=>setActiveSection('overview'),children:"Overview"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:activeSection==='staff'?'nav-btn active':'nav-btn',onClick:()=>setActiveSection('staff'),children:"Staff Management"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:activeSection==='resources'?'nav-btn active':'nav-btn',onClick:()=>setActiveSection('resources'),children:"Resources"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:activeSection==='alerts'?'nav-btn active':'nav-btn',onClick:()=>setActiveSection('alerts'),children:"Alert Management"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:activeSection==='analytics'?'nav-btn active':'nav-btn',onClick:()=>setActiveSection('analytics'),children:"Analytics"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("main",{className:"admin-content",children:[activeSection==='overview'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AdminOverview,{}),activeSection==='staff'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StaffManagement,{}),activeSection==='resources'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ResourceManagement,{}),activeSection==='alerts'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AlertManagement,{}),activeSection==='analytics'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AdminAnalytics,{})]})]});}export default AdminDashboard;
